item.title: Colombia's president calls US attacks on alleged drug boats 'act of tyranny'
item.description: Gustavo Petro told the BBC that "there is no need to kill anyone" in efforts to crackdown on maritime drug smuggling.

item.title: 'Anti-ICE' message on ammunition at Dallas shooting that killed immigration detainee
item.description: The gunman fired at an unmarked van near the detention facility, before taking his own life, officials say.

item.title: Drone activity confirmed at multiple Denmark airports
item.description: The incidents come after the country's Copenhagen airport was forced to close earlier this week due to a drone incursion.

item.title: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky welcome birth of their first daughter
item.description: The celebrity pair announced the birth of Rocki Irish Mayers on Instagram in a post that included a miniature pair of boxing gloves.

item.title: America's blame game over Canada's wildfire smoke misses the point, experts say
item.description: US officials have blamed Canada for not doing enough to stop its wildfire smoke from wafting south. Climate experts say itâ€™s not so simple.
